author: GamingBolt
description:
The latest Nintendo Switch 2 Direct bought with it a ton of major announcements and gaming news. From new game reveals to Switch 2's new features, price and release date, there is no denying that the event was packed with exciting stuff.

In this video, we take a look at 10 of the biggest announcements that happened at the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct event.
title: 10 BIGGEST NINTENDO SWITCH 2 Announcements That Freaked Us Out

author: GamingBolt
description:
The medium of video games has seen a drastic shift in the span of a few decades, and VR gaming is the latest in line of innovations. When VR gaming was in its early days, many passed it as a fad thinking it will die down soon mostly on account of games being extremely gimmicky at their core. 

But as time has passed and VR has matured, many great games have been released that actually use the added layer of interaction to their advantage - delivering a massive leap over what conventional games offer. With this video, we will be taking a look at 20 of the best VR games you shouldn’t miss playing.
title: 20 GREATEST VR Games You Cannot Afford To Miss [2025 Edition]

author: GamingBolt
description:
Whenever fans brought up Days Gone in the past, it was with equal amounts of appreciation and pain. The open-world post-zombie title had its ups and downs, but despite fostering an extensive community of fans, there were no hopes for a sequel or even a PS5 upgrade.

Thankfully, the latter will change on April 25th as Bend Studio is releasing Days Gone Remastered, an enhanced version of the title with improved graphics, shorter loading times, DualSense support, and more. It also offers several new modes for fans to enjoy, like Horde Assault, which involves surviving for as long as possible against massive hordes of zombies.

Speedrun and Permadeath also let you push your skills to the limit, while Photo Mode enhancements allow for even more stunning shots. Here's everything you should know about Days Gone Remastered before it arrives for PS5.
title: Days Gone Remastered PS5 - 15 Things YOU ABSOLUTELY NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy
